title: look for a team
body: looking for a full team to climb with, im willing to learn and get better. just trying to find serious players to play with. i play bot, top, and mid mostly. My pocket pick is Jinx {{champion:222}}  but can also play with cait {{champion:51}}. My mid champs include: vei {{champion:45}}, annie {{champion:1}}, and cho' {{champion:31}} . this season ive been playing top with garen {{champion:86}}, cho'{{champion:31}}  and, don't laugh, teemo {{champion:17}}. i really take this game seriously, and would love to get better. Please consider me as a choice for your team.

replies.body: Wrong server. These are the OCE Boards. Try posting on https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/
